alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 05 at 2:55PM MST until December 08 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM TUESDAY TO 6 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts across the eastern San Juan mountains. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...La Garita and Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Feet. * WHEN...From 6 PM Tuesday to 6 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft
